title: My Favorite Things
album: Live at the Village Vanguard Again!

lastfm.summary: The title track, My Favorite Things, is a nearly 14-minute rendition that transforms the original midtempo waltz into a hypnotic exploration of sound. John Coltrane and pianist McCoy Tyner engage in extended improvisations over a vamp alternating between E minor and E major, deviating from the original song's structure. This approach not only showcased Coltrane's innovative style but also helped bridge jazz to broader audiences, making it one of his most requested pieces. Read more on Last.fm.
